### Exercise 9

````{r eval = FALSE}
# Remove eval = FALSE or set it to TRUE once data is ready to be loaded
art <- art %>%
  separate(___, into = c("___", "___"), sep = "\\(") %>%
  mutate(year = str_remove(___, "\\)") %>% as.numeric()) %>%
  select(title, artist, year, link)
````
